description: You don’t always plan where you’re going to make your turns. You follow your impulse - backcountry, on-piste. That’s the essence of freeride. The Micon is created to go wherever that impulse takes you. Its hybrid construction leverages two types of waterproof, windproof GORE-TEX fabric to reach an optimal balance of breathability, durability, and comfort. The full-length bib seals out snow, side vents let you dump heat on skin tracks, and its advanced design is reflected in its progressive look.
name: Arcteryx Micon Bib Pants - Mens
